action: Research requires often tailor made data, and doesn't have clearly specified boundaries.

story.iWouldLikeTo: use the data for analysis, prediction, and modeling
story.inOrderTo: inform policy makers

story.iWouldLikeTo: Communicate to the public what data is collected. Data is from everybody and for everybody.
story.inOrderTo: Build trust between citizens, car operators and the government and share knowledge.

standards.name: OD-Matrix-odz
standards.explanation: the data has to be aggregated per mode, not per operator, as no commercial sensitive data may be shared

story.iWouldLikeTo: digitally publish unplanned events beforehand or in realtime rules for providers to implement, such as emergency road closures, water main breaks, etc
story.inOrderTo: to help them keep their users and contractors informed and safe.
